text:
In ChainsawToolBarAndMenus.java

in
private Action createUndockAction()

the line:

action.putValue(
      Action.SHORT_DESCRIPTION,
      "Undocks the current Log panel into it's own window");

should say "its" instead of "it's" because "it's" is the contraction for "it 
is."
creator: neilson@windstream.net
